recipe.author: Valli Little
recipe.title: Spaghetti marinara
recipe.description: Take a shortcut with a good marinara mix, or choose your own favourite seafood

dish.name: marinara sauce
dish.step: Heat [oil|1.1] in a large frying pan over medium-low heat and add [garlic|2.1] and [anchovies|3.1]. Cook, stirring, for 1-2 minutes until anchovies have melted. Add [tomatoes|4.1] and [wine|5.1] and bring to a simmer, then reduce the heat to low and cook for 20 minutes until slightly reduced.
Add the [prawns|8.1] and remaining [seafood|7.1] and cook for a further 2-3 minutes until the marinara mix and prawns are cooked through. Season to taste with [salt|10.1] and [black pepper|11.1].

dish.name: pasta
dish.step: Meanwhile, cook the [pasta|6.1] in a large pan of boiling salted water according to packet instructions. Drain, then return to the pan and toss in a little [olive oil|1.2].
Add the marinara sauce to the drained pasta and toss to combine, then divide among bowls and serve garnished with [parsley leaves.
